    #include <iostream>
    #include<cmath>
    #include <vector>
    #include<algorithm>
    #include <string>
    #define min(a,b) a<b?a:b
    #define ll long long
    #define M 1000000007

    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
   int n;
   cin>>n;
   string s="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
   string j="zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba";
   while(n--)
   {
       int p;
       cin>>p;
       if(p<=25)
       {
           for(int i=25-p;i<26;i++)
           cout<<j[i];
       }
       else
       {
           int q=p%25;
         if(q>0)
        for(int i=q;i>=0 ;i--)
           cout<<s[i];
           for(int i=0;i<p/25;i++)
           cout<<j;
       }
       cout<<endl;

   }

return 0;
}
